scripts.say:
Eagle Union coastal waters 
	Siren Threat Assessment Rating: 0
We made it out! Now our comms should... Hey, they're still being jammed!
I can't get in touch with the coastal defense fleet either... Hey, Enterprise? Think you could launch some scout planes? I'm worried about an attack on NY City.
Uh, Cleve... has this area always been prone to waves this big?
Waves...? Oh, God! Enterprise, the sea has totally changed! This is lookin' really bad!
This can only mean one thing: we've entered a Mirror Sea! All ships, prepare for combat!
A Mirror Sea?! This close to home?!
This is just like that report said! "One moment everything's normal, then the next you're in a Mirror Sea!"
Picking up signals from unidentified vessels!
It's a massive Siren fleet! They're coming at us from every direction!
"And then, bam! Before you know it, you're completely surrounded by Sirens"! It's exactly the same!
Everyone, turn around and maintain your distance to each other! We'll trace our route back to get out of here!
You heard the lady! Follow her and be careful, guys!
